entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 this evening then falling. POP 70%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023
